Name: Cubiya
About the game: An Old School Puzzle With A Twist Cubiya is a calming 3D puzzle game with a charming story and a soothing atmosphere. With only you and the music, not a lot of distractions from solving the puzzles and building the plant. A familiar mechanic, pushing a box, but with a literal twist... Rotate around the broken chunks to solve the puzzles. You and the box must twist your perspective to succeed in the game.
